issue.title: Splitwise Clone - Modern Expense Sharing App
issue.body:
## Overview
Build a modern, polished expense-sharing web app. Friends can track shared expenses and settle debts easily.

## Features

### Authentication
- Google OAuth sign-in
- Email/password sign-up and login
- Secure session management

### Groups
- Create expense groups (roommates, trips, events)
- Invite members by email
- Dashboard showing all groups with balance summaries

### Expenses
- Add expenses with description, amount, who paid
- Split equally or custom amounts per person
- Expense history with filtering

### Balances & Settlements
- Real-time balance calculations
- Simplified debt algorithm (minimize transactions)
- One-click settle up

### Real-time Updates
- Live updates when expenses are added
- No page refresh needed

## Tech Stack & Libraries

### Setup Requirements
Run these to get latest versions:
```bash
npx create-next-app@latest --typescript --tailwind --eslint --app
npx shadcn@latest init
npm install better-sqlite3 @types/better-sqlite3
npm install next-auth @auth/core
npm install lucide-react
npm install socket.io socket.io-client
```

### Stack
- **Framework**: Next.js 14 App Router
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui components
- **Icons**: Lucide React
- **Database**: SQLite with better-sqlite3
- **Auth**: NextAuth.js with Google + Credentials providers
- **Real-time**: Socket.io

## Design Requirements

### Visual Style
- Clean, minimal design - NOT generic AI-generated look
- Thoughtful use of whitespace
- Subtle shadows and borders
- Consistent color palette (pick something distinctive, not purple gradients)
- Smooth micro-animations on interactions

### Mobile First
- Responsive design that works great on phones
- Touch-friendly tap targets
- Bottom navigation on mobile
- Swipe gestures where appropriate

### Components to Use (shadcn/ui)
- Card, Button, Input, Avatar
- Dialog for modals
- Dropdown menu for actions
- Toast for notifications
- Tabs for navigation

## Pages
- `/` - Landing page (marketing)
- `/login` - Auth page (Google + email/password)
- `/dashboard` - Groups overview
- `/groups/[id]` - Group detail with expenses & balances
- `/groups/new` - Create group
- `/settings` - User settings
